text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=edu.ku.spencer.spencertourapp.
Application Name: Spencer Museum of Art - KU.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: The Spencer Museum of Art app provides easy access to the Museum’s collection through images, videos, and text. Explore with audio and video tours, browse photographs of objects with multiple views, and learn more with digital label copy.Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 255.00.
Overall Rate: 4.40.
First Page Reviews: Great way to explore the museum both onsite and from afar! works well, minimal crashes As good as not being there could get while you are there. Very helpful with providing additional information while visiting the museum..
